webwork-tex.statement:
Let \(z = \sqrt{5x+5y}\). Then: \par
The rate of change in \(z\) at \((5,1)\) as we change \(x\) but hold \(y\) fixed is \mbox{\parbox[t]{7.5ex}{\hrulefill}}, and \par
The rate of change in \(z\) at \((5,1)\) as we change \(y\) but hold \(x\) fixed is \mbox{\parbox[t]{7.5ex}{\hrulefill}}.
